snippet: Islamic militants attacked a boarding school in northeast Nigeria, killing 29 students and a teacher. Survivors said that some pupils were burned alive.
abstract: At least 30 people are killed when Islamic militants attack and set fire to boarding school in northeast Nigeria; authorities blame radical group Boko Haram.
lead_paragraph: Islamic militants attacked a boarding school in northeast Nigeria, killing 29 students and a teacher. Survivors said that some pupils were burned alive.

headline.main: Militants Attack School in Nigeria, Killing Students and a Teacher
headline.print_headline: Militants Attack School in Nigeria, Killing Students and a Teacher
